POST45 DATA COLLECTIVE

The Post45 Data Collective peer reviews and houses literary and cultural data from 1945 to the present on an open-access website.

Datasets

Feminist Bookstore News Issues and Articles (1976-2000)

print
feminist
bookstore
publishing
dataset
This dataset contains metadata for all articles and issues of Feminist Bookstore News from 1976 to 2000.
Jan 9, 2025
Julie R. Enszer, Salome Grasland, Cassidy Hunt, Michaela Hayes

The National Endowment for the Arts Creative Writing Fellowships (1965-2024)

prizes
education
gender
race
MFA
dataset
This dataset contains a comprehensive list of the writers sponsored by NEA fellowships from the organization’s founding in 1965 to 2024, including information about those writers’ demographics, education, and geography.
Dec 11, 2024
Alexander Manshel

The Nordic Noir in Translation Database (2000–2020)

translation
genre fiction
dataset
This dataset contains bibliographic records of all translations of Nordic crime fiction for adults, written in any of the five main Nordic languages (Danish, Finnish, Icelandic, Norwegian and Swedish) and published in translation during the period 2000–2020.
Feb 1, 2024
Karl Berglund, Jesper Gulddal, Stewart King

The Index of Major Literary Prizes in the US

prizes
education
gender
MFA
dataset
The Index of Major Literary Prizes in the US includes datasets to the winners and judges of prizes for prose, poetry, or unspecified genre between 1918 and 2020 with a purse of $10,000 and over.
Dec 5, 2022
Claire Grossman, Juliana Spahr, Stephanie Young

New York Times Hardcover Fiction Bestsellers (1931–2020)

bestsellers
fiction
dataset
The New York Times Hardcover Fiction Bestsellers includes datasets about bestselling books from 1931 and 2020.
Feb 1, 2022
Jordan Pruett

Iowa Writers’ Workshop

education
MFA
gender
dataset
The Program Era Project (PEP) has assembled three datasets related to the Iowa Writers’ Workshop (IWW), one of the most prestigious MFA programs in the US.
Apr 21, 2021
Nicholas Kelley, Nicoel White, Loren Glass

HathiTrust Post45 Fiction (1945-2013)

metadata
fiction
dataset
This dataset contains metadata and HathiTrust IDs for fiction held by the HathiTrust Digital Library published between 1945 and 2013.
Apr 21, 2021
Ted Underwood
